name: Gmail: Rounded Square Label Badges for New Gmail
description:
Rounded square badge-like label indicators in the message list.

Originally based on https://userstyles.org/styles/109101/gmail-badges-rounded-in-message-indexes with some modifications: labels do not expand on hover, and are now displayed as square "blobs" to better fit within the new Gmail styling
additional_info: 2018-06-02: Fix for message with no text preview
